00042 class Property {
00043 public:
00044     Property() : _path("") {}
00045     
00046     Property(const string &name, const string &value, const string &path) 
00047         : _name(name), _value(value), _path(path) {}
00048     
00055     Property &add(const string &key, const string &value);
00062     Property &set(const string &key, const string &value);
00063     
00073     Property &get(const string &key);
00074 
00080     bool exists(const string &key);
00081     
00090     std::list<Property *> Select(const string &filter);
00091     
00096     string &value() { return _value; }
00101     string name() { return _name; }
00108     string path() { return _path; }
00109 
00116     template<typename T>
00117     T as() const;
00118 
00123     bool HasChilds() { return !_map.empty(); }
00124 
00126     typedef list<Property>::iterator iterator;
00127     
00129     iterator begin() { return _properties.begin(); }
00131     iterator end() { return _properties.end(); }
00133     list<Property>::size_type size() { return _properties.size(); }
00134 
00135     // throw error and comment (with filename+code line)
00136     void throwRuntimeError(string message);
00137 
00139     void PrintT2T();
00140     
00147     template<typename T>
00148     T getAttribute(const string &attribute);
00149 
00153     template<typename T>
00154     void setAttribute(const string &attribute, const T &value);
00155 
00156 private:        
00157     map<string,Property*> _map;
00158     map<string,string> _attributes;
00159     list<Property> _properties;
00160     
00161     string _name;
00162     string _value;
00163     string _path;
00164     
00165     static void PrintNode(std::ostream &out, const string &prefix, Property &p);
00166     
00167     friend std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, Property& p);
00168

00170         Property *prop;
00171         string comment;
00172     };
00173 /*
00174 stack<Property *> -> stack< Propertz_stack_entry_t>
00175 */
00176 };

00181 inline Property &Property::set(const string &key, const string &value)
00182 {
00183     Property &p = get(key);
00184     p.value() = value;
00185     return p;
00186 }
00187 
00188 inline Property &Property::add(const string &key, const string &value)
00189 {
00190     string path = _path;
00191     if(path != "") path = path + ".";
00192     _properties.push_back(Property(key, value, path + _name ));
00193     _map[key] = &(_properties.back());
00194     return _properties.back();
00195 }
00196 
00197 inline bool Property::exists(const string &key)
00198 {
00199     try { get(key); }
00200     catch(std::exception &err) { return false;}
00201     return true;
00202 }
00203     
00204 bool load_property_from_xml(Property &p, string file);
00205 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, Property& p);

00207 // TO DO: write a better function for this!!!!
00208 template<>
00209 inline bool Property::as<bool>() const
00210 {
00211     if(_value == "true" || _value == "TRUE" || _value == "1") return true;
00212     else return false;
00213 }
00214 
00215 template<typename T>
00216 inline T Property::as() const
00217 {
00218     return lexical_cast<T>(_value, "wrong type in " + _path + "."  + _name + "\n");
00219 }
00220 
00221 template<>
00222 inline std::string Property::as<std::string>() const
00223 {
00224     string tmp(_value);
00225     boost::trim(tmp);
00226     return tmp;
00227 }
00228 
00229 template<>
00230 inline vec Property::as<vec>() const {
00231     vector<double> tmp;
00232     Tokenizer tok(as<string > (), " ,");
00233     tok.ConvertToVector<double>(tmp);
00234     if (tmp.size() != 3)
00235         throw runtime_error("Vector has " + boost::lexical_cast<string > (tmp.size()) + " instead of three entries");
00236     return vec(tmp[0], tmp[1], tmp[2]);
00237 }
00238 
00239 template<>
00240 inline vector<unsigned int> Property::as<vector <unsigned int> >() const {
00241     vector<unsigned int> tmp;
00242     Tokenizer tok(as<string > (), " ,");
00243     tok.ConvertToVector<unsigned int>(tmp);
00244     return tmp;
00245 }
00246 
00247 template<>
00248 inline vector<int> Property::as<vector <int> >() const {
00249     vector<int> tmp;
00250     Tokenizer tok(as<string > (), " ,\n\t");
00251     tok.ConvertToVector<int>(tmp);
00252     return tmp;
00253 }
00254 
00255 template<>
00256 inline vector<double> Property::as<vector <double> >() const {
00257     vector<double> tmp;
00258     Tokenizer tok(as<string > (), " ,\n\t");
00259     tok.ConvertToVector<double>(tmp);
00260     return tmp;
00261 }
00262 
00263 template<typename T>
00264 inline T Property::getAttribute(const string &attribute)
00265 {
00266     return lexical_cast<T>(_attributes[attribute], "wrong type in attribute " + attribute + " of element " + _path + "."  + _name + "\n");
00267 }
00268 
00269 template<typename T>
00270 inline void Property::setAttribute(const string &attribute, const T &value)
00271 {
00272      _attributes[attribute] = lexical_cast<string>(value, "wrong type to set attribute");
00273 }
